snippet: Matthew Davies, a medical marijuana store owner, abandoned a six-month legal battle against Washington and pleaded guilty to 10 charges of marijuana cultivation and distribution.
abstract: Matthew Davies, medical marijuana store owner in California, pleads guilty to 10 charges of marijuana cultivation and distribution; prosecution of Davies by federal authorities highlights vast disparities in how state and Justice Department respond to medical marijuana industry.
lead_paragraph: Matthew Davies, a medical marijuana store owner, abandoned a six-month legal battle against Washington and pleaded guilty to 10 charges of marijuana cultivation and distribution.

headline.main: California: Marijuana Seller Takes Plea Deal
headline.print_headline: California: Marijuana Seller Takes Plea Deal
